title: Warwick's login screen music

replies.body: Thanks for your kind words, you two <3
Just curious, where's Utora at? I saw him posting so much at one point and now I never see him.

> [{quoted}](name=ShadowParker,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HmdGvVWZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-11-16T19:28:22.249+0000)
>
> Just curious, where's Utora at? I saw him posting so much at one point and now I never see him.

Utora left Riot for a great opportunity, a passion project of his. We miss him terribly (him and I worked on Kindred, Jhin, Kled, Ralan and Xayah, some Dark Star stuff, etc.).

Kindred, Jhin, Dark Star...

I mourn Riot's loss

Ah dang. Do you think he'll be back in the future/do you guys keep contact?

I loved his work.

You are a genius.  
Keep up the good work. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Xyrov,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HmdGvVWZ,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-11-17T00:40:45.877+0000)
>
> You are a genius.  
> Keep up the good work. :D

<blushes> I love League and I love writing music - I’m a lucky man with no genius to report (I do work a lot to compensate for tha, though). Thanks for your kind words!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HmdGvVWZ,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2017-11-17T00:46:50.842+0000)
>
> <blushes> I love League and I love writing music - I’m a lucky man with no genius to report (I do work a lot to compensate for tha, though). Thanks for your kind words!!!

You and the entire music team are amazing!!! I love the Hunters login, and Zoe's login, and ALL THE MUSIC AHHHHHH!!
Tiny little question. I'm the idiot who asked about an internship in the music department on Twitter (I know I @'d you). I notice you are not terribly active on Twitter so in case you haven't seen it... I'm a huge music nerd. I play the violin, I love arranging music, and I'd love to help you guys get more sheet music out to the public in a user-friendly format. Thoughts on the concept? Wait 'til I'm older 'cause I'm currently in high school (sorta)? (There's a very real possibility I could end up going to college near Riot, which would be even better.)

That would be the incredibly talented EdtheConquerer! He's working on some really cool stuff coming down the pipeline, but the most recent thing he did was for [PROJECT: Hunters!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XvmIf9CzIw8)

He's got some fun range too haha - Star Guardian [2016](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oorajmbSJUM) and [2017](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-lx_1kgEjOk) to [Xayah and Rakan's theme](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O4PDzBnBMU4). He breaks some of his process down for the [Dark Star Thresh theme!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1h9c-O3AEkE)

From Warwick's and Thresh's dark themes to Star guardian and Xayah/Rakan.   Woah
He truly is a genius.
